In accordance with what I said some time ago on social media, this time I will provide 3 simple and responsive navigation bar templates to complement the website or blog that you are creating.
There are 2 ways to use this template, you can download all the files (html, css, js) in my github repository or directly copy the code from this article.
the method
download copy navigation view 1 first 2 second 3 third download all files Open this link https://github.com/dai-re/3-navbar-templates
Click code after that click download ZIP Or you can also use the terminal by
1 git clone https://github.com/dai-re/3-navbar-templates copy the code first style html

margin: 0; } :root { --logo: #C51212; --bg: rgba(48, 49, 59, 1); } .nav_body { width: 100%; background: var(--bg); padding: 8px 0px; position: relative; } .nav_box { margin: auto; color: #fff; width: 85%; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; } .nav_box .logo { font-weight: 900; font-size: 20px; letter-spacing: 4px; color: var(--logo); } .menu { margin-top: -25em; position: absolute; right: 2px; transition-duration: 1s; z-index: 3; opacity: 0; } .menu ul { display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 150px; padding: 8px; align-items: center; background: var(--bg); border-radius: 5px; gap: 10px; } .menu-active { margin-top: 13em; opacity: 1; } .menu ul li { list-style: none; } .menu ul li:active { color: var(--logo); } .menu ul li:nth-child(5) { color: #fff; font-weight: 500; background: var(--logo); padding: 5px 8px; border-radius: 5px; } .menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover { background: #7A1717; } .menu ul li a { color: unset; text-decoration: none; } .hamburger { position: absolute; right: 10px; z-index: 5; flex-direction: row; right: 2px; width: auto; padding: 0; align-items: center; background: unset; border-radius: 0; gap: 10px; } .menu ul li { list-style: none; } .menu ul li:active { color: var(--logo); } .menu ul li:nth-child(5) { color: #fff; font-weight: 500; background: var(--logo); padding: 5px 8px; border-radius: 5px; } .menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover { background: #7A1717; } .menu ul li a { color: unset; text-decoration: none; } .hamburger { display: none; } } javascript
